At  [0-1], a blue-haired cartoon girl character is surrounded by several pink heart shapes. This is the first appearance of pink heart shapes in the video. The question asks how many times the pink heart shapes or pink glow sticks appear throughout the video. Given the information from this segment, the pink heart shapes appear once. </think>
<answer>B</answer>
